MAN.TITLE: precornerdetec
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Calculates feature map for corner detection

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Aperture parameter for Sobel operator (see Sobel).

DESCRIPTION.P: precornerdetect The function PreCornerDetect calculates the function (Dx^2 Dyy + Dy^2 Dxx - 2 Dx Dy Dxy) where D? denotes one of the first image derivatives and D?? denotes a second image derivative. The corners can be found as local maximums of the function:
